abstract: Thousands of pilgrims from as far away as California attend canonization mass for Junipero Serra, given by Pope Francis at  Basilica of the National Shrine of the Immaculate Conception in Washington, DC; many Latino Catholics see ceremony as mark of recognition for Hispanics in Roman Catholic Church as well as in United States.
lead_paragraph: Pope Francis canonized Junípero Serra, a Franciscan friar who spread the Gospel through California in the 18th century.

headline.main: Pilgrims Gather in Washington to See Pope Francis Canonize Junípero Serra

snippet: Pope Francis canonized Junípero Serra, a Franciscan friar who spread the Gospel through California in the 18th century.
